name: parrying
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
parry
to defend yourself from a weapon or an attack by pushing the weapon away or by putting something between your body and the weapon
to manage cleverly to avoid dealing with a difficult question or some criticism: Predictably the president parried enquiries about the arms scandal.
